Best game ever!! I mean there are very few games that focus on tactical fps and this is one of the best tactical fps i haveever played! You can play with your friends and rank up together, discuss and make new strats in custom maps and also have fun in a casual server. There maybe some toxicity but when u play with your friend, the experience gets 100 times better.
